You can use backticks for showing highlighted code.

A cool bit of code:

1#!/bin/bash
2# Some cool Bash code
3echo ${BASH_VERSINFO[*]}
4ros2 pkg create --build-type ament_cmake <package_name>

 1 <joint
 2  name="front_right_lidar_joint"
 3  type="fixed">
 4  <origin
 5    xyz="2.1064 -1.1064 1.92"
 6    rpy="0 0 0" />
 7  <parent
 8    link="base_link" />
 9  <child
10    link="front_right_lidar" />
11  <axis
12    xyz="0 0 0" />
13</joint>
